author: lryan
msg: Applying metadata driven osapi implementation patch contributed by Bob Evans.
- osapi methods dynamically generated by introspecting JSON-RPC system.listMethods on available endpoints declared in
- Simplified command line JSUnit test runner
- Moved gadget APIs endpoints to /gadgets/api/rpc and /gadgets/api/rest

author: jbonofre
msg: [SMXCOMP-508] The user can now provided its own implementation of the ExecMarshalerSupport interface to constructs the exec command using the in normalized message.
